          <title>
            <string language="nl">Furniture - build the words</string>
          </title>
          <language>nl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This worksheet is designed especially for pupils with dysgraphy and dysorthography, to help them develop basi vocabulary in English</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser Bogen ist besonders für Pupillen mit dysgraphy und 
dysorthography bestimmt, um ihnen zu helfen, basi Wortschatz auf 
englisch zu entwickeln</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce tableau est conçu particulièrement pour des pupilles avec
le dysgraphy et le dysorthography, pour les aider à développer le 
vocabulaire de basi en anglais</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta folha é projetada especial para as pupilas com dysgraphy
e dysorthography, ajudar-lhes desenvolver o vocabulário do basi em

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo foglio di lavoro è destinato particolarmente per le 
pupille con il dysgraphy ed il dysorthography, per aiutarlo a 
sviluppare il vocabolario di basi in inglese</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το φύλλο εργασίας σχεδιάζεται ειδικά για τους μαθητές με το
dysgraphy και το dysorthography, για να τους βοηθήσει να 
αναπτύξουν το λεξιλόγιο basi στα αγγλικά</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta hoja de trabajo se diseña especialmente para las pupilas
con dysgraphy y dysorthography, para ayudarles a desarrollar

            <string language="nl">First spaek about the topic Furniture with any picture in common textbook. Than practise with thi worksheet, handout one per pupi. lAsk pupils to find the words they already know, than help them to discover the forgotten ones, ask them to rewrite them properly, practise the pronounciation again</string>
